about_the_game:
The Official Guide to The Falconeer gives a unique insight into this incredible one-of-a-kind game. Gain a deeper understanding of the mysterious open world of The Great Ursee with details on essential skills such as flight and weapon control, weapon types, equipment, and upgrades. Delve deeper into the lore of the game as you learn about Falconeer classes and discover the unique characteristics of opposing factions, with game maps showing key locations.

The files can be found within the game's local folder. This can be accessed by right-clicking on the game within the Steam Libary, then selecting 'Manage' and 'Browse local files'.

The files can be found within the game's local folder. This can be accessed by right-clicking on the game within the Steam Libary, then selecting 'Manage' and 'Browse local files'.
